pli-tv-kd9:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā campāyaṁ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma hoti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.3: Tattha kassapagotto nāma bhikkhu āvāsiko hoti tantibaddho ussukkaṁ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.4: “kinti anāgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṁ, ayañca āvāso vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.6: Addasā kho kassapagotto bhikkhu te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante, disvāna āsanaṁ paññapesi, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ upanikkhipi, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi, pānīyena āpucchi, nahāne ussukkaṁ akāsi, ussukkampi akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.7: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.8: “bhaddako kho ayaṁ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṁ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.9: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.10: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.2: “yo kho imesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.3: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.4: Dukkaraṁ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṁ ussukkaṁ kātuṁ, viññatti ca manussānaṁ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.5: Yannūnāhaṁ na ussukkaṁ kareyyaṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.6: So na ussukkaṁ akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.7: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.8: “pubbe khvāyaṁ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṁ akāsi, ussukkampi akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.9: Sodānāyaṁ na ussukkaṁ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.11: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āvāsikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ukkhipāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.1: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.2: “pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṁ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.3: Sodāni tvaṁ na ussukkaṁ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.7: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.9: “ahaṁ kho etaṁ na jānāmi ‘āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā, āpanno camhi anāpanno vā, ukkhitto camhi anukkhitto vā, dhammikena vā adhammikena vā, kuppena vā akuppena vā, ṭhānārahena vā aṭṭhānārahena vā’.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.10: Yannūnāhaṁ campaṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ etamatthaṁ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.1: Atha kho kassapagotto bhikkhu senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.2: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.3: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.4: Atha kho bhagavā kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.1: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.2: Tatthāhaṁ, bhagavā, āvāsiko tantibaddho ussukkaṁ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.3: ‘kinti anāgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṁ, ayañca āvāso vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.4: Atha kho, bhante, sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.5: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante, disvāna āsanaṁ paññapesiṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ upanikkhipiṁ, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesiṁ, pānīyena apucchiṁ, nahāne ussukkaṁ akāsiṁ, ussukkampi akāsiṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.6: Atha kho tesaṁ, bhante, āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.7: ‘bhaddako kho ayaṁ āvuso āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṁ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.8: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.9: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.11: ‘yo kho imesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.12: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.13: Dukkaraṁ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṁ ussukkaṁ kātuṁ, viññatti ca manussānaṁ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.14: Yannūnāhaṁ na ussukkaṁ kareyyaṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.15: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, na ussukkaṁ akāsiṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.16: Atha kho tesaṁ, bhante, āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.17: ‘pubbe khvāyaṁ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṁ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.18: Sodānāyaṁ na ussukkaṁ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.20: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āvāsikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ukkhipāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.21: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā maṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.22: ‘pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṁ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.23: Sodāni tvaṁ na ussukkaṁ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.27: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū maṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.29: ‘ahaṁ kho etaṁ na jānāmi “āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā, āpanno camhi anāpanno vā, ukkhitto camhi anukkhitto vā, dhammikena vā adhammikena vā, kuppena vā akuppena vā, ṭhānārahena vā aṭṭhānārahena vā”.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.30: Yannūnāhaṁ campaṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ etamatthaṁ puccheyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.5: Gaccha tvaṁ, bhikkhu, tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.6: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho kassapagotto bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena vāsabhagāmo tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.1: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ahudeva kukkuccaṁ, ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.2: “alābhā vata no, na vata no lābhā;
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.3: dulladdhaṁ vata no, na vata no suladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.4: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, campaṁ gantvā bhagavato santike accayaṁ accayato desemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.5: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.6: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.7: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.8: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.13: appakilamathena ca mayaṁ, bhante, addhānaṁ āgatā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.14: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.6: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisā, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.7: Kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipissatha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.9: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.10: “na, bhikkhave, suddho bhikkhu anāpattiko avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.2: “accayo no, bhante, accagamā yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale, ye mayaṁ suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.3: Tesaṁ no, bhante, bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.4: “Taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, accayo accagamā yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale, ye tumhe suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipittha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.5: Yato ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarotha, taṁ vo mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.6: Vuddhihesā, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti, āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.2: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.3: dhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.5: ekopi ekaṁ ukkhipati, ekopi dve ukkhipati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipati, ekopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.6: dvepi ekaṁ ukkhipanti, dvepi dve ukkhipanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti, dvepi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.8: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.2: “kathañhi nāma campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.3: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karissanti, dhammena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ karissanti, ekopi ekaṁ ukkhipissati, ekopi dve ukkhipissati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipissati, ekopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipissati, dvepi ekaṁ ukkhipissanti, dvepi dve ukkhipissanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipissanti, dvepi saṅghaṁ ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi ekaṁ ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi dve ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi saṅghaṁ ukkhipissanti, saṅghopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.5: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.10: “ananucchavikaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ moghapurisānaṁ ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.11: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.1: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.2: adhammena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.3: dhammena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.4: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.5: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.6: ekopi ekaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.7: ekopi dve ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.8: ekopi sambahule ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.9: ekopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.10: dvepi ekaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.11: dvepi dve ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.12: dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.13: dvepi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.14: sambahulāpi ekaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.15: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.16: sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.17: sambahulāpi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.18: saṅghopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.2: adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṁ adhammena vaggakammaṁ, idaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ adhammattā vaggattā kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.4: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṁ adhammena samaggakammaṁ, idaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ adhammattā kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.6: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṁ dhammena vaggakammaṁ, idaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ vaggattā kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.8: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṁ dhammena samaggakammaṁ, idaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ dhammattā samaggattā akuppaṁ ṭhānārahaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.10: evarūpaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, evarūpañca mayā kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.11: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ karissāma yadidaṁ dhammena samagganti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.2: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.3: dhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.4: ñattivipannampi kammaṁ karonti anussāvanasampannaṁ, anussāvanavipannampi kammaṁ karonti ñattisampannaṁ, ñattivipannampi anussāvanavipannampi kammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.5: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṁ karonti, aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṁ karonti, aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.6: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karonti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.9: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.10: dhammena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.11: ñattivipannampi kammaṁ karissanti anussāvanasampannaṁ, anussāvanavipannampi kammaṁ karissanti ñattisampannaṁ, ñattivipannampi anussāvanavipannampi kammaṁ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.12: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṁ karissanti, aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṁ karissanti, aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṁ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.13: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karissanti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.14: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.15: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.17: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karonti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahan”ti?
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.20: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.1: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.2: adhammena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.3: dhammena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.4: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.5: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.6: Ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ anussāvanasampannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.7: anussāvanavipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ ñattisampannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.8: ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ anussāvanavipannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.9: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.10: aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.11: aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.12: paṭikuṭṭhakatañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.2: adhammakammaṁ, vaggakammaṁ, samaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya ñattiyā kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.5: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi ñattīhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.6: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya kammavācāya kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.7: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi kammavācāhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.1: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya ñattiyā kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi ñattīhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.4: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tīhi ñattīhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catūhi ñattīhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca kammavācaṁ anussāveti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya kammavācāya kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi kammavācāhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.8: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tīhi kammavācāhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.9: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catūhi kammavācāhi kammaṁ karoti, na ca ñattiṁ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.3: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.6.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.6.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.3: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.8.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.8.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ kammavācaṁ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.9.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, pacchā ekāya kammavācāya kammaṁ karoti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.9.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṁ ñattiṁ ṭhapeti, pacchā tīhi kammavācāhi kammaṁ karoti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti, dhammena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.2: catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho pañcavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, dasavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, atirekavīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.4: upasampadaṁ pavāraṇaṁ abbhānaṁ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ pañcavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā dve kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.6: majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadaṁ abbhānaṁ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ dasavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā ekaṁ kammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.10: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ atirekavīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.1: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunicatuttho kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.3: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānacatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.17: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakacatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.47: Yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁcatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.2: Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunipañcamo kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.4: Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānapañcamo kammaṁ kareyya …pe….
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.11: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakapañcamo kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.26: yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁpañcamo kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.2: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunidasamo kammaṁ kareyya, akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.3: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānadasamo kammaṁ kareyya, akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ …
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.5: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁdasamo kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.2: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunivīso kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.4: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānavīso kammaṁ kareyya …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.11: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakavīso kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.26: yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁvīso kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.2.1: Pārivāsikacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṁ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṁ dadeyya, taṁvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.4: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṁ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṁ dadeyya, taṁvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.6: Mānattārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṁ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṁ dadeyya, taṁvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.8: Mānattacārikacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṁ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṁ dadeyya, taṁvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.10: Abbhānārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṁ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṁ dadeyya, taṁvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.1: Ekaccassa, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati, ekaccassa na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.2: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.3: Bhikkhuniyā, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.28: iddhiyā vehāse ṭhitassa, bhikkhave, yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, tassa ca, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.29: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.1: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.2: Bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, pakatattassa samānasaṁvāsakassa samānasīmāya ṭhitassa antamaso ānantarikassāpi bhikkhuno viññāpentassa saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.3: Tañce saṅgho nissāreti, ekacco sunissārito, ekacco dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.4: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suddho hoti anāpattiko. Tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.6: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.7: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—sunissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno, gihisaṁsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṁsaggehi, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—sunissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.9: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—sunissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ tañce saṅgho osāreti, ekacco sosārito, ekacco dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.4: Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.5: Theyyasaṁvāsako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.14: ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, appatto, osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.15: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.16: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṁ, te ce saṅgho osāreti—dosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.2: Hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.33: andhamūgabadhiro, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.34: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.35: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṁ, te ce saṅgho osāreti—sosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.1.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.2: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti paṭikātabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.9: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.10: ‘āpattiṁ tvaṁ, āvuso, āpanno, paṭikarohi taṁ āpattin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.15: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti pāpikā diṭṭhi paṭinissajjetā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.16: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.17: ‘pāpikā te, āvuso, diṭṭhi, paṭinissajjetaṁ pāpikaṁ diṭṭhin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.19: ‘natthi me, āvuso, pāpikā diṭṭhi, yamahaṁ paṭinissajjeyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.20: Taṁ saṅgho pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhipati—

pli-tv-kd9:6.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā upāli yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd9:6.1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā upāli bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:6.1.3: “yo nu kho, bhante, samaggo saṅgho sammukhākaraṇīyaṁ kammaṁ asammukhā karoti, dhammakammaṁ nu kho taṁ, bhante, vinayakamman”ti?

pli-tv-kd9:7.1.1: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.3: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.7: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.9: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena tajjanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.1.19: So tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ gacchati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.

pli-tv-kd9:7.14.49.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.14.67: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.15.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako.

pli-tv-kd9:7.20.13: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.14: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.15: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.17.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.19: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.28: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.29: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.30: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.31: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.33.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.35: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.44: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.45: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.46: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.47: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.50.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.52: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.53: Handassa mayaṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.54: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.61: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.62: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.63: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.64: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.66.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.68: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.69: Handassa mayaṁ āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.70: Te tassa āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.77: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.78: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.79: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.80: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.82.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.84: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.85: Handassa mayaṁ pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.86: Te tassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.93: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ, akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.94: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.95: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.96: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
